title: Story
desc: Configure story related settings for this application.

fields.label: Allow Attachment
fields.tooltip: Determines if attachment is allowed when creating discussion in story form.
fields.name: story_attachment

title: Stream
desc: Configure stream related settings for this application.

fields.label: New Discussions
fields.tooltip: Determines if posting new post would appear on the stream
fields.name: stream_create

fields.label: Reply To Discussions
fields.tooltip: Determines if replying to a post would appear on the stream
fields.name: stream_reply

fields.label: Likes On Discussion
fields.tooltip: Determines if likes on a post would appear on the stream
fields.name: stream_likes

fields.label: Vote On Discussion
fields.tooltip: Determines if voting on a post would appear on the stream
fields.name: stream_vote

fields.label: Display Comment Stream Items
fields.tooltip: Determines if posting a comment on a post would appear on the stream
fields.name: stream_comment

fields.label: Convert Comment to Reply
fields.tooltip: Determines if posting a comment on a post would create a reply in discussion
fields.name: stream_comment_convert

fields.label: Display Favorite Stream Items
fields.tooltip: Determines if favouriting a discussion would display on the stream
fields.name: stream_favourite

fields.label: Max Characters (Stream Content)
fields.tooltip: Specify the numbers of recently created new posts of the user to display
fields.name: stream_max_chars
